description: This file provides a data service module for interacting with a Supabase backend, including user authentication, profile management, and request handling functions. It normalizes data, manages auth state, and enforces database constraints for requests.

methods.name: supaUserToAppUser
methods.description: Converts a Supabase auth user object into a minimal app user object, including fetching role and approval status from profiles.

methods.name: normalizeVehicle
methods.description: Normalizes vehicle data from database row or input object to a standardized {make, model} format.

methods.name: normalizeContact
methods.description: Normalizes contact data from database row or input object to a standardized {name, phone} format.

methods.name: forceUserCreateStatusOpen
methods.description: Ensures request payload has status set to 'open' and strips any caller-provided status.

methods.name: normalizeSupabaseAuthError
methods.description: Converts various Supabase auth error messages into user-friendly strings.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new user with email and password via Supabase auth.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Logs in a user with email and password via Supabase auth.

methods.name: loginWithGoogle
methods.description: Initiates OAuth login with Google via Supabase.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Signs out the current user via Supabase.

methods.name: getUserFromSession
methods.description: Retrieves the current user session, returning a user object or null.

methods.name: getCurrentUser
methods.description: Retrieves the current authenticated user object or null.

methods.name: subscribeToAuthChanges
methods.description: Subscribes to auth state changes, providing real-time user updates.

methods.name: getProfile
methods.description: Fetches user profile data from 'public.profiles' table.

methods.name: listRequests
methods.description: Lists requests, optionally filtered by user ID, normalizing data fields.

methods.name: getRequestById
methods.description: Fetches a specific request by ID, normalizing data fields.

methods.name: createRequest
methods.description: Creates a new request with enforced 'open' status and normalized data.

methods.name: isSupabaseConfigured
methods.description: Checks if Supabase environment variables are configured (always returns true here).
